remarks: The additive identity of a ring is a right identity element. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ring0cl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ring0cl.2 $e |- X = ran G $.
ring0cl.3 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
rngo0rid $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G Z ) = A ) $.
